title: Has topless Jovetic copied Ronaldo?
text:
0 16-Jan-2017 14:50:59 After firing his side to a late victory over Real Madrid with an injury time screamer, the striker emulated the Portuguese star with a familiar pose 
Sevilla ended Real Madrid's undefeated run on Sunday night with a 2-1 fightback, as Stevan Jovetic sealed three points in stoppage time. 
  Zinedine Zidane's side the lead from the penalty spot, but new signing Jovetic had other plans, following up a Sergio Ramos own goal by taking all the headlines from the record-equalling Real star on the pitch. 
Ramos turns Liga title race on its head 
After the match, Jovetic also attempted to go one better than Ronaldo, as he posed shirtless for Sevilla's post-game dressing room selfie. 
The Ballon d'Or winner appeared in a series of dressing room snaps last year, posing with team-mates after their 2-1 El Clasico victory over Barcelona in April, and then again after a 1-1 draw in the same clash in December. 
In both of the photos, Ronaldo was pictured shirtless - something Jovetic copied for his pose on Sunday night. — Joaquin Correa (@tucu_correa) January 15, 2017 
He's only been at Sevilla a week, but he already seems to have gotten one better than the Portugal superstar! Related
